meanings.definition: A tip or gratuity given for services rendered.
meanings.sent1: I left some baksheesh for the waiter at the restaurant.
meanings.sent2: It is customary to give baksheesh to the hotel staff in some countries.
meanings.sent3: The baksheesh I gave the taxi driver made him smile.
meanings.sent4: She received baksheesh from the tourists like a queen receiving gifts.
meanings.sent5: The baksheesh was a token of appreciation for the hardworking staff.

meanings.definition: To give a tip or gratuity.
meanings.sent1: I always baksheesh the bellboy when checking out of a hotel.
meanings.sent2: Remember to baksheesh the tour guide at the end of the trip.
meanings.sent3: He decided to baksheesh the street performer with a big smile.
meanings.sent4: She baksheeshed the waiter generously for the excellent service.
meanings.sent5: Baksheeshing is a way to show appreciation for good service.
